reviewtext: I do a lot of networking with other businesses (Linksys and belkin) love the Linksys and the belkin both.I am very happy with this switch, it workes great without problems (sofar), connects easely and smoothly with-out trouble.I love this switch.It says, connect and use, I just connected all the cables, with in seconds, it was working GREAT with no problems.I recomend this to anyone.If anything goes wrong, I will update.(Bought at staples)(I am using my moms account)
summary: First time using a netgear, I love it!!
